description:
Data extracted from the PanCancer Atlas initiative on the GDC in April 2018. Contains DNA Methylation data generated using Illumina Human Methylation 27k. 

Note: The data was annotated with pertinent TGCA barcodes data, and filtered from the BigQuery table isb-cgc:pancancer_atlas.jhu_usc_edu_PANCAN_HumanMethylation27_betaValue_whitelisted using the PanCancer Atlas whitelist (table Whitelist_ParticipantBarcodes ) 

More details: BigQuery table: isb-cgc:pacancer_atlas.jhu_usc_edu_PANCAN_HumanMethylation27_betaValue_whitelisted 
and https://gdc.cancer.gov/about-data/publications/pancanatlas

fields.description: TCGA barcode identifier for the study participant, eg TCGA-02-0001
fields.name: ParticipantBarcode

fields.description: Barcode of the biospecimen sample, eg TCGA-13-1489-02A
fields.name: SampleBarcode

fields.description: Letter code of the sample type using the TCGA standards, eg TPN, EBV. Full list available at https://gdc.cancer.gov/resources-tcga-users/tcga-code-tables/sample-type-codes
fields.name: SampleTypeLetterCode

fields.description: There are 10 sample types: Blood Derived Normal, Primary solid Tumor, Solid Tissue Normal, Recurrent Solid Tumor, Metastatic, Additional - New Primary, Primary Blood Derived Cancer - Peripheral Blood, Buccal Cell Normal, Additioanal Metastatic, Bone Marrrow Normal
fields.name: SampleType

fields.description: TCGA study abbreviation, eg LAML. Full list available at https://gdc.cancer.gov/resources-tcga-users/tcga-code-tables/tcga-study-abbreviations
fields.name: Study

fields.description: Unique probe identifier (eg cg04676771) from the Illumina Human Methylation array -- please refer to the annotation table (isb-cgc:platform_reference.methylation_annotation) for more details about any particular probe
fields.name: ID

fields.description: Normalized DNA methylation beta value (between 0 and 1, where 0 indicates completely un-methylated and 1 indicates fully methylated)
fields.name: Beta
